Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1007.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Railroad Company to M. L. Wicks.

summary.text: Confirms a conveyance of certain real property, with respect to all interests of the United States in its surface rights, by the Southern Pacific Railroad Company to a certain individual.

titles.title: A bill to confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Railroad Company to M. L. Wicks.
